title: Very nice views
text: It was interesting to visit this place not only because of ancient ruins, but also nice views to the Athens - all from above. I think that the better time to visit is in the morning or in the evening, especially when it is hot.

title: Nothing special, but it depends on travellers expectations
text: It was very hot. Poor soldiers - they have to stand in a still pose. We were just passing by while going to another museum, so no problem, but I would not go there with the intention to see how soldiers stand there.
